channel.title: Tsai Ming-Liang on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tsai Ming-Liang on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Tsai Ming-liang to Shoot and Premiere Next ‘Walker’ Film at Ji.hlava Film Festival
item.description: Malaysia-born Taiwanese director Tsai Ming-liang, who won the Golden Lion at Venice for “Vive L’Amour,” will shoot and present the next in his series of “Walker” films at the 29th Ji.hlava Film
